test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity description/remark field becomes editable when gratuity amount is zero (or verify current disabled state and document as blocker)
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify EOS transaction can be edited (gratuity and leave encashment amounts modified) and resubmitted without 'something went wrong' error
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify End of Services tab is hidden for offboarded employees and visible for active employees in employee profile
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify gratuity accrual report displays column headers and labels for 'Accrual up to previous payroll cycle close' and 'Total accrual amount'
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify EOS transaction form submission workflow for offboarded employees and error message display
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that Final Settlement Amount field is visible and displays correctly on EOS calculation screen; check that UI clearly shows how deductions are applied to total
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity cap field in accrual report displays and is labeled correctly (should indicate Gross salary basis, not Basic salary only)
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify month labels are clearly displayed on gratuity file download interface and employee profile to prevent confusion between months
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity file export has correctly aligned column headers matching the data content displayed in each column
Verify that Gratuity Report includes customizable fields, filtering options, and displays all required information fields (extra information fields as per requirements)
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify Employee ID and Office columns are present in downloaded Gratuity export file
Verify gratuity liability report total calculation excludes non-numeric columns (e.g., Tenure in Years column not included in sum)
Verify Gratuity field is available in custom payroll report template dropdown and displays correctly in downloaded report
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify payroll accrual reports (Air Ticket Allowance, Gratuity Accrual, Leave Salary Accrual) are accessible for multiple closed payroll cycles, not just the most recent
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify error message appears when submitting EOS transaction; check error message text and visibility; verify submit button state when error occurs
Verify gratuity description text displayed in EOS form for Qatar clients; check if description references correct country labor law; verify text content accuracy
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

task_flows.flow_name: Process End of Service for Single Employee
steps: Enter departure date in date field
Add or modify deductions if needed

task_flows.source_article: How to calculate gratuity for an individual employee

steps: File downloads with gratuity liability for all employees
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate your total gratuity liability for all employees

duplicate_groups.theme: EOS form submission and error handling
duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify End of Service transaction submission completes successfully after editing gratuity/leave encashment amounts, and displays specific error messages (not generic 'something went wrong') when validation fails
Cannot be tested with Playwright - all require backend calculation verification against UAE labor law formulas
Verify gratuity calculation logic handles different scenarios (partial months, limited contracts, termination vs resignation) - requires backend validation, not UI testing
Verify gratuity file download interface displays clear month labels and exports with correctly aligned column headers matching data content
Verify gratuity export files and custom payroll reports include correct columns, calculate totals accurately, and display gratuity data for all applicable employees
Cannot test - all are backend calculation issues involving gratuity formulas, service duration logic, and unpaid leave handling
Cannot test - both require backend data verification across multiple system modules and file generation logic

not_testable_tickets.summary: BE: Rename existing "Leave Encashments" labels to "Leave Encashments for End of Service"
not_testable_tickets.reason: Won't Do status - ticket cancelled, no implementation to test

not_testable_tickets.summary: Calculation of Leave Encashment in EOS
not_testable_tickets.reason: Cancelled status - no implementation to test. Also involves backend calculation logic verification

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't change the hiring date of the employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Cancelled status - no implementation to test. System constraint is by design

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't request end of service of an employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved status - bug already fixed, nothing to test now
Closed status - feature request already resolved. Report correctness is backend calculation verification
Closed status - support question already answered. Involves backend leave accrual calculation logic
Closed status - calculation dispute already resolved. Verifying calculation correctness requires backend logic validation, not UI testing

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service giving error: Something went wrong
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved status - bug already fixed. Generic error handling improvement is backend concern
Requires verification of backend calculation logic for leap year adjustments; Playwright cannot validate mathematical formula correctness

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service pro rated amount isssue
not_testable_tickets.reason: Already resolved; no current UI state to test. Requires backend calculation verification for decimal precision
Feature request for backend functionality (reopen/reverse finalized settlements); cannot test UI that doesn't exist yet
Requires verification of calculation accuracy against MOHRE standards; Playwright cannot validate mathematical correctness of tenure calculations
Requires verification of gratuity calculation formula correctness; Playwright cannot validate backend calculation logic
Ticket is cancelled; no active issue to test
Requires verification of backend calculation logic for mid-month departures and unpaid leave adjustments; Playwright cannot validate formula correctness
Resolved ticket; backend calculation discrepancy (AED 231,821 vs AED 252,485) requires business logic verification, not UI testing
Resolved ticket; backend calculation logic for document generation (payslip vs settlement letter) cannot be tested via UI automation

not_testable_tickets.summary: GOSI Calculated in EOS while it is already submitted
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket; backend calculation bug involving duplicate GOSI deduction logic requires database/calculation verification

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity Accrual report - calculation of closing/opening balance and new hire
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket; backend calculation of report balances across payroll cycles cannot be validated via UI
Closed ticket; backend recalculation logic when employee profile changes requires database verification

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity amount not considering leap year days
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket; backend calculation methodology for leap year handling cannot be tested via UI
Resolved ticket; backend calculation logic for UAE Labor Law 2021 compliance (contract type handling) requires business logic verification
Resolved support ticket; backend calculation discrepancy (AED 6,998.25) requires business logic verification against UAE labor law
Resolved support ticket; backend calculation methodology for leap year (366 days) handling is a business logic question
Backend calculation logic for prorated leave accrual during partial month offboarding; Playwright cannot verify mathematical correctness of accrual formulas
Backend gratuity calculation logic verification; Playwright cannot validate mathematical accuracy of gratuity amounts or compare against manual calculations
Backend calculation logic for limited contract employees; Playwright cannot verify mathematical correctness of gratuity formulas for different contract types
Backend calculation issue (AED 0 amounts) and historical date selection; Playwright cannot verify calculation accuracy or validate past month data correctness
Configuration and salary setup validation; Playwright cannot verify backend salary configuration prerequisites or database state
Backend calculation logic differentiation between termination and resignation scenarios per UAE labor law; Playwright cannot verify mathematical formula differences

not_testable_tickets.summary: Hiring date needs to be updated
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend data consistency issue - requires database verification and payroll transaction history validation

not_testable_tickets.summary: Incorrect days worked in gratuity calculation
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation bug - requires verification of mathematical formula (Basic Salary / 30) and days worked count accuracy
Backend calculation logic - requires verification of inclusive date calculation methodology and comparison with external calculators

not_testable_tickets.summary: Investigate EOS pro rated mid month pay behavior for deduction
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend payroll calculation - requires verification of pro-rated salary deduction formula for mid-month departures
Backend calculation bug - requires verification of month-counting logic and leave days formula accuracy
Feature request cancelled - no current implementation to test
Backend calculation issue - system splitting SIF file generation based on arrears logic; cannot test file generation or backend payroll logic with Playwright
Data inconsistency across backend modules; requires database verification and cross-system data synchronization testing, not UI validation
Documentation/help article clarification request; not a testable UI bug or feature - resolved as documentation update

not_testable_tickets.summary: Urgent : EOS Gratuity calculation Error / Bug
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend gratuity calculation logic error based on departure reason; mathematical formula computation cannot be tested via UI automation
Backend calculation issue with unpaid leave handling in gratuity formula; requires backend logic verification, not UI testing

not_testable_tickets.summary: Wrong Total Service duration in End of Service
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation of service duration; mathematical computation logic cannot be validated through UI automation

focus_area_definitions.sidebar_expanded: Capture sidebar menu with submenus visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.modal_dialog: Capture modal/dialog centered with background dimmed, show all form fields
focus_area_definitions.dropdown_expanded: Capture dropdown with ALL options visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.data_table: Capture table with headers and at least 5 data rows visible
focus_area_definitions.form_section: Capture complete form with all fields, labels, and validation states
focus_area_definitions.accordion_expanded: Capture accordion section fully expanded showing all content
focus_area_definitions.tab_content: Capture tab bar showing all tabs with active tab content below
focus_area_definitions.main_content: Capture main content area excluding sidebar, include breadcrumbs
focus_area_definitions.full_page: Full page scroll capture for comprehensive documentation
